date.headline: Abram notifies OPSEC
date.text: Abram calls OPSEC to inform them of an attempt to gain unauthorized funds from our account.

date.headline: Abram forwards malicious email
date.text: OPSEC requested Abram forward the malicious eMail for further review.

date.headline: OPSEC locks down Abram's inbox
date.text: By changing the password temporarily, OPSEC blocks any possible unauthorized access to Abram's GMail account.

date.headline: Postini Block
date.text: OPSEC denies any inbound email from various sarif.com alternate addresses, including saif, and sarrif.

date.headline: Notification Email
date.text: OPSEC produced an eMail for all of the Sarif employees, reminding them of the dangers of Phishing, and to be aware we are being targeted.

date.headline: Operation:  THAT'S MINE!
date.text: eMail was sent to the Attacker's registrar, informing them of the malicious fraud attempt.

date.headline: CAUGHT IN THE ACT!
date.text: Using a non-existant page on the Sarif portal, OPSEC was able to determine the attacker's source IP.  This IP was extracted from our WebLogs

date.headline: Beginning of the End
date.text: OPSEC eMailed Softlayer, the owner of the IP block the attacker originated from, notifying them of this fraudulent activity.
